bodydiv.p: The IFRS Taxonomy update contains information in a human-readable form, including:

li.p: the questions on which feedback is sought (this applies only to a proposed IFRS Taxonomy update);
the proposed (or final) amendments being made; for example, the elements being added or removed from the IFRS Taxonomy; and
the reasons behind these changes and, when alternative options exist, the reasoning as to why a specific option is preferred.
